sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
grows
, narašča po velikosti, količini ali stopnji.

seg.quote: Babies who are small at birth grow faster.
Jobs in industry will grow by 11 per cent.

sense.def:
Kadar rastlina, na primer drevo,
grows in a particular place
, uspeva na nekem kraju.

seg.quote: An oak tree grew at the edge of the lane.

sense.def:
To grow plants
pomeni dati rastline v zemljo in skrbeti zanje, ko se razvijajo.

seg.quote: The district grew peas on a large scale.
My father was a great rose grower.

sense.def:
Kadar moški
grows a beard or a moustache
, pusti, da mu zrastejo brada ali brki in se zato ne brije.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
COMPLEMENT, TO-INF,
or
ADJUNCT

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
grows into a particular state
, se postopoma spreminja, dokler ni v določenem stanju.

seg.quote: The sun grew so hot that they were forced to stop working.
I grew to dislike working for the cinema.

sense.def:
Kadar neka ideja
grows out of another
, se razvije iz druge ideje.

seg.quote: My own idea grew out of seeing this film.

sense.def:
Kadar otroci
grow into a piece of clothing
, postanejo večji, tako da jim oblačilo, ki jim je bilo preveliko, postane prav.

seg.quote: She was someone whose charm grew very slowly on you.

sense.def:
To grow out of a type of behaviour
pomeni prenehati se vesti na določen način.

Kadar otroci
grow out of a piece of clothing
, postanejo tako veliki, da jim določeno oblačilo ni več prav.

To grow up
pomeni postopoma se spremeniti iz otroka v odraslega človeka.

seg.quote: They grew up in the early days of television.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
grows up
, postane močnejše.

seg.quote: The idea has grown up that science cannot be wrong.
